rescuecore2.misc.geometry

Class Point2D

  • java.lang.Object
    • rescuecore2.misc.geometry.Point2D
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Indexable

    public class Point2D
extends java.lang.Object
implements Indexable
    A point in 2D space. Points are immutable.
